name: O Kraken My Kraken!
description:
The year was 1690. Captain Jules was on his final voyage to close out a lucrative 40-year career as a pirate on the high seas. He longed to return home to spend his final years at peace with his daughter and grandchild. "Mates, this be the last one for me," he said with a grin as he sipped his rum.

Little did he know how right he would be...

Will Captain Jules be able to recover all of his treasure before the ship goes down?

HOW TO PLAY

Patch the leaks to the boat inflicted by the Kraken, and collect as much treasure as you can before it goes down!

GAME CONTROLS

Movement: LEFT/RIGHT ARROW

Jump: UP ARROW

Repair Leaks: SPACE

Open Treasure: SPACE

CREDITS

This game is a collaboration between Pandamander and Coopal00ps, made in 28 days.

Made with Unity and Photoshop. Music by Pandamander in Ableton, based on The Wellerman. Sounds with SFXR.

And THANK YOU - THE PLAYER!

MUSIC

! NOTE FOR MAC USERS !

If you try to open the game and it says it "can't be opened", try this: Unzip the downloaded file, then right click > Open instead of left clicking to open. This will give a new option to open the game
